about_the_game: The Last Table is a psychological horror experience where your ordinary shift takes a deadly turn. As a waitress in a small restaurant, you must manage your duties while under the watchful gaze of a sinister stalker. Each order you serve brings you closer to a final, terrifying confrontation. Use your wits, stay one step ahead, and survive the night—or become his next victim. Will you make it through the shift, or is this your last table?
detailed_description: The Last Table is a psychological horror experience where your ordinary shift takes a deadly turn. As a waitress in a small restaurant, you must manage your duties while under the watchful gaze of a sinister stalker. Each order you serve brings you closer to a final, terrifying confrontation. Use your wits, stay one step ahead, and survive the night—or become his next victim. Will you make it through the shift, or is this your last table?
name: The Last Table

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No

Recommended:

short_description: The Last Table is a psychological horror game where your ordinary shift turns deadly. As a waitress, you must juggle your duties while being stalked by a sinister customer. Each order brings you closer to a terrifying confrontation. Will you use your wits to survive or become his next victim?
